name: Coming Out (dyoungbird)
description:
Description

A short story about finding strength in your friends and coming out.

A game developed for the Rainbow Jam 2020

Controls

WASD for character movement

Mouse & Left-Click for dialogue interaction

'R' to restart

'Esc' to quit game

Attribution

'Ambiance - Heavy Rain Loop' by DWOBoyle

https://freesound.org/people/DWOBoyle/sounds/136971/
